companyDescription: Gondar Car Rentals is a premier car rental service based in Gondar, Ethiopia, offering a wide range of vehicles for both local and international travelers. Our fleet includes economy cars, SUVs, luxury vehicles, and electric cars, all maintained to the highest standards of safety and comfort.

generalPolicies.description: Renters must be at least 21 years old. A surcharge of 200 ETB per day may apply for renters aged 21-24. Drivers must possess a valid driver's license for at least one year.
Vehicles are provided with a full tank of fuel and must be returned with a full tank. Otherwise, a refueling service charge of 500 ETB plus the cost of fuel will be applied.
Electric vehicles must be returned with a minimum of 80% charge. A recharging fee of 750 ETB may apply if returned with a lower charge level.
Returns more than 2 hours late without prior notification may incur an additional day's rental charge. Each additional hour past the grace period will incur a 10% of daily rate fee.
Vehicles should be returned in a reasonably clean condition. Excessive dirt, stains, or odors (e.g., smoking, pet odors) may result in an additional cleaning fee ranging from 1000 ETB to 5000 ETB.

Vehicles are generally restricted to driving within the country of rental (Ethiopia). Travel outside designated areas or specific regions (e.g., restricted national parks) without prior approval is prohibited and may result in penalties.

Free cancellation up to 48 hours before pick-up time. Cancellations within 24-48 hours may incur a fee equivalent to 50% of one day's rental. Cancellations within 24 hours or no-shows will be charged the full one-day rental fee.

A valid national driver's license (held for at least one year), a passport or national ID, and a major credit card in the renter's name are strictly required at the time of vehicle pick-up. International driving permits are required for non-residents.
An additional driver can be added to the rental agreement for a fee of 150 ETB per day. All additional drivers must meet the minimum age requirements and present a valid driver's license.

Basic roadside assistance is included with every rental. This covers mechanical breakdowns not caused by renter negligence. For issues like flat tires (due to punctures), running out of fuel, or lockout services, additional charges may apply.
Child safety seats (infant, toddler, booster) are available upon request for an additional daily fee of 100 ETB. Please reserve them in advance to ensure availability.
Smoking (including e-cigarettes and vaping) is strictly prohibited in all rental vehicles. A cleaning fee of 3000 ETB will be charged if evidence of smoking is found.
